org.alien4cloud.server

Class MaintenanceModeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.alien4cloud.server.MaintenanceModeService

  • @Service
public class MaintenanceModeService
extends Object
    Service that manage maintenance mode enablement.

      • update

        public void update(String user,
                   String message,
                   Integer progressPercentage)
        Update the current state of the maintenance mode.
        Parameters:
        user - Name of the user that performed the update.
        message - A message to update the maintenance.
        progressPercentage - The new percentage of the maintenance.

      • internalUpdate

        Let an internal process update the current state of the maintenance.

        message - A message to update the maintenance.
        progressPercentage - The new percentage of the maintenance.
